title: If you could have a telephone conversation with one person in the world, who would it be and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Someone from my dad's side of family I guess my pawpaw or mawmaw I've never meet them there where dead since before I was born I don't know anyone or hardly anything about that side of my family and never could understand why ?? I feel like there's secrets

I would call on Bill Gates and try to convince him to be a guest on our podcast. I see him on YouTube talking about the ongoing pandemic. We'll get more into that and ask his advices about running a business startup in this new normal. He's built Microsoft from the ground up so he must have some very useful advices like a guru
